import { Container, Row, Col, Form, Button, Card, InputGroup, Carousel, DropdownButton, Dropdown, } from "react-bootstrap"; import banner from "../../images/banner1.jpg"; export default function Home() { return ( <> {/* Your pets section */} Food Shelter
Your Pets
 Fluffy Fluffy is a cute cat who loves to play with toys and cuddle with her owner. Rex Rex is a friendly dog who loves to go for walks and play fetch with his owner. Buddy Buddy is a loyal dog who loves to spend time with his family and protect his home.
); }
